This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Sets a `value` amount of tokens as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729 Emits an {Approval} event."},"assets()":{"returns":{"assetList":"List of allowance(address,address).details: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` will be allowed to spend on behalf of `owner` through {transferFrom}. This is zero by default. This value changes when {approve} or {transferFrom} are called.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets a `value` amount of tokens as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. IMPORTANT: Beware that changing an allowance with this method brings the risk that someone may use both the old and the new allowance by unfortunate transaction ordering. One possible solution to mitigate this race condition is to first reduce the spender's allowance to 0 and set the desired value afterwards: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729 Emits an {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the value of tokens owned by `account`.

borrow(address,uint256,address).details: Whitelisted agents can borrow any amount, LTV is handled by Agent contracts

burn(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.details: Asset is withdrawn from the reserve or divested from the underlying vault

params._amountIn: Amount of cap token to burn
Amount of cap token to burn
Amount of cap token to burn

returns.amountsOut: Amounts of assets to be withdrawn
returns.redeemFees: Amounts of redeem fees to be applied

params.assets: Asset addresses to mint Cap token with
params.name: Name of the cap token

mint(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.details: This contract must have approval to move asset from msg.sender

params._amountIn: Amount of asset to use in the minting

realizeInterest(address).details: Left permissionless so arbitrageurs can move fees to auction

redeem(uint256,uint256[],address,uint256.details: Assets are withdrawn from the reserve or divested from the underlying vault

params._amountIn: Amount of Cap token to burn
params._minAmountsOut: Minimum amounts of assets to withdraw

params._feeData: Fee slopes and ratios for the asset in the vault

totalSupply().details: Returns the value of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Moves a `value` amount of tokens from the caller's account to `to`. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Moves a `value` amount of tokens from `from` to `to` using the allowance mechanism. `value` is then deducted from the caller's allowance. Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded. Emits a {Transfer} event.

addAsset(address).notice: Add an asset to the vault list

assets().notice: Get the list of assets supported by the vault

burn(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Burn the cap token for an asset

claimableInterest(address).notice: Interest from a fractional reserve vault

currentUtilizationIndex(address).notice: Up to date cumulative utilization index of an asset

divestAll(address).notice: Divest all of an asset from a fractional reserve vault and send any profit to fee auction

fractionalReserveVault(address).notice: Fractional reserve vault address for an asset

getBurnAmount(address,uint256).notice: Get the burn amount for a given asset

getMintAmount(address,uint256).notice: Get the mint amount for a given asset

investAll(address).notice: Invest unborrowed capital in a fractional reserve vault (up to the reserve)

mint(address,uint256,uint256,address,uin.notice: Mint the cap token using an asset

paused(address).notice: Get the pause state of an asset

realizeInterest(address).notice: Realize interest from a fractional reserve vault and send to the fee auction

redeem(uint256,uint256[],address,uint256.notice: Redeem the Cap token for a bundle of assets

removeAsset(address).notice: Remove an asset from the vault list

setFeeData(address,(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Set the allocation slopes and ratios for an asset

setFractionalReserveVault(address,addres.notice: Set the fractional reserve vault for an asset, divesting the old vault entirely

setReserve(address,uint256).notice: Set the reserve level for an asset

setWhitelist(address,bool).notice: Set the whitelist for a user

totalBorrows(address).notice: Get the total borrows of an asset

totalSupplies(address).notice: Get the total supplies of an asset
